DispositionConfigDirectory java.lang.String Default Disposition values, if no disposition is encoded in the TEXT context item with a concept name of (113012, DCM, “Key Object Description”) of the Export Selector. DefaultDisposition java.lang.String Maximum number of concurrent processed Export Requests. Concurrency int Used internally. Do NOT modify. StoreScpServiceName javax.management.ObjectName Used internally. Do NOT modify. QueueName java.lang.String Identifies JNDI (e.g: jnp://hostname:1099) with EJBs.
